channel.description: Recent content in Found In Far Away Places on

item.title: Ghosts
item.description: [[songs/d/depeche_mode/exciter/the_dead_of_night.md#we-are-the-dead-of-night-vyl-wnanory|We are the ghosts of the midway]] [[songs/d/depeche_mode/exciter/the_dead_of_night.md#we-are-the-dead-of-night-vyl-wnanory|The beasts of the alley]] [[songs/d/depeche_mode/exciter/the_dead_of_night.md#we-are-the-dead-of-night-vyl-wnanory|We are the living dead]] [[songs/d/depeche_mode/exciter/the_dead_of_night.md#we-are-the-dead-of-night-vyl-wnanory|Living in your nightmares]] [[songs/s/sum_41/chuck/no_reason.

item.title: Identity
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/sometimes_youre_the_hammer_sometimes_youre_the_nail.md#tend-to-do-my-best-when-everything-goes-wrong-vyl-wnanory|Do you know how it feels to hide]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/sometimes_youre_the_hammer_sometimes_youre_the_nail.md#tend-to-do-my-best-when-everything-goes-wrong-vyl-wnanory|With thoughts repressed deep down inside?]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/sometimes_youre_the_hammer_sometimes_youre_the_nail.md#tend-to-do-my-best-when-everything-goes-wrong-vyl-wnanory|I guess you just loved the lie]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/sometimes_youre_the_hammer_sometimes_youre_the_nail.

item.title: Majoring In The Minors
item.description: [[songs/o/opeth/deliverance/by_the_pain_i_see_in_others.md#outside-in-the-park-vyl-wnanory|These windy streets tell of a different time]] [[songs/o/opeth/deliverance/by_the_pain_i_see_in_others.md#outside-in-the-park-vyl-wnanory|What got us here won’t get us there]] [[songs/o/opeth/deliverance/by_the_pain_i_see_in_others.md#outside-in-the-park-vyl-wnanory|It’s time for the upright to have insight]] [[songs/o/opeth/deliverance/by_the_pain_i_see_in_others.

item.title: Martyr
item.description: [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#behind-the-darkness-theres-a-sea-of-neon-lights-vyl-wnanory|Demand what you will never deserve]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#behind-the-darkness-theres-a-sea-of-neon-lights-vyl-wnanory|Respect is gained by trust shown and earned]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#behind-the-darkness-theres-a-sea-of-neon-lights-vyl-wnanory|Don’t mask your pride with humility]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.

item.title: The Wake
item.description: [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#dont-wake-me-up-im-winning-wars-inside-my-head-vyl-wnanory|Destroy everything, cleanse]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#dont-wake-me-up-im-winning-wars-inside-my-head-vyl-wnanory|Wipe away the filth, set fire to your waste]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#dont-wake-me-up-im-winning-wars-inside-my-head-vyl-wnanory|Burn everything, back into dirt]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/seeya/seeya.md#dont-wake-me-up-im-winning-wars-inside-my-head-vyl-wnanory|Burn everything]] [[songs/g/godhead/power_tool_stigmata/lies.
